name: sharepass
description: **CredShare.app is a simple and secure sharing service for password or other secrets.**

scripts.build-assets: shx mkdir -p static/js/highlight static/css/highlight static/css/material-icons && shx cp node_modules/feather-icons/dist/feather.min.js static/js/feather.min.js && shx mkdir -p static/css/highlight && shx cp node_modules/highlight.js/styles/default.min.css static/css/highlight/default.min.css
